availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Taliaferro (Hopkins County, Kentucky, tavern keeper and justice of the peace)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, tavern keeper and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth E. Pratt Taliaferro on November 1, 1859. Resident of Hopkins County in 1860. Tavern keeper in Madisonville, Kentucky, in 1863. Justice of the peace in Hopkins County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 114; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Hopkins County, Kentucky, 1863, p. 157, (Accessed via ancestry.com);"Kentucky Marriages, 1785-1979," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F4WW-ZQD : 4 December 2014), John N. Taliaferro and Elizabeth E. Pratt, 01 Nov 1859; citing , Hopkins, Kentucky, reference ; FHL microfilm 0216827 IT 4.
